text: Table 3b Risks of general anaesthesia. Risk Incidence Chest infection 1in5 Sore throat 1in5 Nausea/Vomiting 1in 10 Difficult airway 1in 300 Aspiration 1in 300 Corneal abrasion 1in 600 Dental damage 11in 4500 Awareness 1in 250-1000 Anaphylaxis 1in 10000-20,000 Death or brain damage ~ Less than 1 in 100,000 (death) Very rare (brain damage) — exact figures do not exist Reproduced with the kind permission of the Obstetric Anaesthetists’ Association.
